biotools.summary: CGSEA is a flexible tool for evaluating the associations of chemicals with complex diseases. CGSEA for scanning the candidate chemicals associated with complex diseases or traits. CGSEA only need genome-wide summary level data, such as transcriptome-wide association studies (TWAS) and mRNA expression profiles.

bioschemas.name: CGSEA
